DOC.criteria: BMI > 27 kg/m2 ( adult ) weight loss 5kg last 2 month patient : severe heart failure impair hepatic renal function severe anaemia disturb coagulation infection , malabsorption severe hypertension myopathia uncontrolled endocrine disorder change smoke habit diet within last 3 month prior study inclusion
